details.subtitle: A recognition of our commitment to quality
details.paragraph1: We are proud to announce that KYA-Energy GROUP obtained the ISO 9001:2015 certification in 2024, issued by TÜV Rheinland. This certification demonstrates our unwavering commitment to excellence, continuous improvement, and the satisfaction of our customers and partners.
details.paragraph2_strong: A recognition of our quality approach
details.paragraph3: Since its creation, KYA-Energy GROUP has been committed to providing innovative and sustainable solutions... we guarantee that our services meet the strictest requirements in terms of performance, reliability, and continuous improvement.

essentials.title: Why is this certification essential?
essentials.subtitle: Obtaining this certification is the result of a collective effort and a constant desire to strengthen our internal practices. It allows us to:

items.customerSatisfaction: Ensure optimal customer satisfaction by effectively meeting their needs and expectations.
items.processImprovement: Continuously improve our processes to ensure high-quality services.
items.teamCohesion: Strengthen the cohesion and qualification of our teams through training and structured work methods.
items.healthyEnvironment: Guarantee a healthy and efficient work environment, in line with our values.

commitment.title: Our QHSE commitment:
commitment.subtitle: A sustainable and responsible future
commitment.paragraph: Beyond quality, our commitment also includes Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE) aspects. We work every day to improve our environmental and safety performance...
